content.prompt: Which of the following public policies would Democrats be most likely to support?

choices.label: Reducing taxes on American businesses and corporations
Increasing the age of eligibility for social security benefits
Reducing the size of the federal government by eliminating an executive department
Increasing taxes on the wealthiest Americans

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Explain how political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors apply to different scenarios in context.
